subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Officials of Alinghi, the America’s Cup champion, said that they would appeal a judge’s ruling last week that rejected United Arab Emirates as the site for the race against BMW Oracle in February.
snippet: Officials of Alinghi, the America’s Cup champion, said that they would appeal a judge’s ruling last week that rejected United Arab Emirates as the site for the race against BMW Oracle in February.
